name: Hubble Network
headline: Bluetooth to Space
description: Hubble is building a global satellite network that any Bluetooth-enabled device can connect to, even without cellular reception.  Our mission in life is to get a billion devices connected to the network and unlock a new era of human-machine collaboration.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:hard-tech; industry:hardware; industry:iot; industry:satellites; location:seattle

founders.name: John Kim, Founder
founders.description: Background in spacecraft design, regulatory affairs, and early stage operations--launched over $1B in space hardware throughout career including four geostationary communication satellites and an experiment to the ISS on Space Shuttle Endeavour's final flight. Deep-space-tech enthusiast, always looking for the next paradigm-shifting space technology.

founders.name: Ben Wild, Founder
founders.description: Background in Electrical Engineering with a focus on wireless communications, signal processing and robotics. Most recently worked at Amazon where I invented and was the product manager for the Amazon Sidewalk wireless IoT network and the Ring Always Home Cam.

generated_description:
### Hubble Network: Connecting Bluetooth to Space

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W22, Hubble Network is a Seattle-based startup on a groundbreaking mission: to connect a billion Bluetooth-enabled devices directly to a global satellite network—essentially, “Bluetooth to Space.” With a small but dedicated team of 20, Hubble is reshaping the Internet of Things (IoT) landscape by bridging the gap between everyday devices and satellite connectivity, even in the absence of cellular networks.

#### What They Do

Hubble Network simplifies the connection to space for wireless devices. The secret sauce? Off-the-shelf Bluetooth chips. Instead of relying on proprietary modems or custom hardware, users can simply upload Hubble's firmware to their existing devices to access global satellite communications. The array of potential applications is vast, including:

- **Asset Tracking**: Attach a BLE chip to any item and track its location affordably, globally.
- **Wildfire Detection**: Use integrated temperature sensors to alert you of fire risks from remote areas directly to satellites.
- **Fleet Management**: Move beyond traditional tracking services with Hubble’s efficient solutions for managing heavy equipment and deliveries.
- **Environmental Monitoring**: Collect high-quality environmental data in even the most remote locations, without extensive infrastructure.

With a focus on sectors like agriculture, environmental monitoring, smart buildings, and logistics, Hubble is geared towards enabling IoT applications that were previously impractical at scale.

#### Why It Matters

Imagine if every package shipped, every piece of machinery operating in the field, or even every wildfire risk could be monitored from space. That’s the ambition of Hubble Network. They’re not just pushing the boundaries of IoT; they’re unlocking an entire ecosystem of human-machine collaboration. By enabling a global, satellite-connected network with just Bluetooth, they're set to create a new era for both businesses and consumers who depend on real-time information.

Under the leadership of Diana Hu and with its innovative tech, Hubble Network is poised to gain traction in an expanding market. If successful, they won’t just revolutionize tracking and monitoring but also catalyze new economic opportunities across numerous industries.

For more information, check out their website at [Hubble Network](https://hubblenetwork.com). This is a startup to watch as they aim for the stars, or rather, the satellites.
